flourishing/vigorous/magnificent/extensively

to hold/to contain/to ladle/to pick up with a utensil

to approach/to rise high/thick ice/to insult or maltreat

sentences.english: Mr Green is always on his high horse.
sentences.chinese: 格林先生總是盛氣凌人的樣子。

sentences.english: His arrogant behaviours on court psyched his opponent out completely.
sentences.chinese: 他在法庭上那盛氣凌人的樣子把對方完全鎮懾住了。

sentences.english: The minister domineers over his inferiors.
sentences.chinese: 那位部長對下級盛氣凌人。
